mapper.select: select count(*) from user u, personal_okr p, okr_core o where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and u.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0 and o.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = p.user_id and o.id = p.core_id and o.is_over = 0

select p.id, p.core_id, f.objective, o.is_over, p.create_time, p.update_time from user u, personal_okr p, okr_core o, first_quadrant f where u.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} and u.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0 and o.is_deleted = 0 and f.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = p.user_id and o.id = p.core_id and o.id = f.core_id order by o.is_over, p.create_time desc
